course.subject: TEMG
course.name: Special Project: Social Venture Advisory and Grant Making for PIM
course.description: Students in this 4-credits experiential-learning course will not only learn but practice on real companies methods of consulting, venture investing and grant making. Course contents will be delivered through a mix of in-class workshops, online modules, field work at clientâ€™s place of business, and in-class debate on best ways to invest up to HK$100,000 of venture fund. Enrollment in the project course requires approval of the course instructor.
